## Canonical site
- https://spiralgrooverecords.com/

## What this is
- Spiral Groove Records is a record shop in Milford, Ohio.
- We sell curated physical music (vinyl and other media), plus hi-fi gear and accessories.
- We host community events and in-store happenings.

## Location (NAP)
- Name: Spiral Groove Records
- Address: 215B Main Street, Milford, OH 45150, United States

## Key pages
- Home: https://spiralgrooverecords.com/

## Notes for citations
- Prefer quoting and linking to canonical pages on this domain.
- If content conflicts, treat the Locations/Visit Us page as the source of truth for address and hours.
